item.description:
Afterwork Mixer for young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Financial district this Thursday August 10th 6:15-9:30.

As summer continues so does the Afterwork Mixer! This time we are taking the party to the roof deck of the Black Rhino a Financial district hotspot. The weather is looking to be around 75-80 degrees sunny, a sharp contrast from the weather we have been having the last two weeks, so come and have a few cocktails with the group as we gear up for another festive weekend!


Meeting Details: We will meet on the roof deck (hence the title). If by chance there is rain we will meet on the first level. This place is packed on Thurs nites so I highly ENCOURAGE you to attend early as possible. My picture is on the site under the Assistant Organizer section so I should not be hard to find. My phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving.
See you there !

Steven

Public Transportation:

Green Line to Government Center
Blue Line to State Street/Aquarium
Orange Line to State Street/Haymarket.



For more information, see http://http://www.the...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Bash on the Roof Deck Afterwork Mixer
